title: Joining forces to fight wildfires: Science and management in a protected area of Pantanal, Brazil
content:
Publication date: September 2024

Source: Environmental Science & Policy, Volume 159

Author(s): Patrícia S. Silva, Julia A. Rodrigues, Joana Nogueira, Livia C. Moura, Alexandre Enout, Cristina Cuiabália, Carlos C. DaCamara, Allan A. Pereira, Renata Libonati
